SEARCH

Package com.hotelapplication.backend

package com.hotelapplication.backend
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.hotelapplication
     
    com.hotelapplication.frontend
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AccountManager
    Controller for creating and managing user and manager accounts in the hotel reservation system.
    Database
    The Database class represents an in-memory storage for managing hotel and user data.
    DatabaseConnector
    The DatabaseConnector class is responsible for managing the connection to the H2 database, initializing tables, and handling operations related to Hotels, Rooms, Users, and Reservations.
    DatabaseManager
    The DatabaseManager class provides static methods to interact with the Database class.
    Hotel
    The Hotel class represents a hotel with attributes like hotel ID, name, rooms, address, and reservations.
    HotelManager
    The HotelManager class provides static methods to manage hotels, rooms, reservations, and various hotel information.
    Manager
    Represents a manager in the hotel reservation system.
    Reservation
    The Reservation class represents a single hotel reservation.
    ReservationManager
    The ReservationManager class provides static utility methods for managing hotel reservations.
    Room
    The Room class represents a hotel room with attributes such as room ID, room number, bed type, description, price per night, and reservations.
    RoomManager
    The RoomManager class provides methods to create, manage, and remove rooms in a hotel.
    TestClass
     
    User
    Represents a user in the hotel reservation system.
